description: People Information Gathering consists of the process of identifying critical personnel elements of intelligence an adversary will need about a target in order to best attack.  People intelligence gathering focuses on identifying key personnel or individuals with critical accesses in order to best approach a target for attack.  It may involve aspects of social engineering, elicitation, mining social media sources, or be thought of as understanding the personnel element of competitive intelligence.
name: OSRS MITRE Pre-ATT&CK Matrix - People Information Gathering

values.description: Open source intelligence (OSINT) provides free, readily available information about a target while providing the target no indication they are of interest. Such information can assist an adversary in crafting a successful approach for compromise.
values.value: OSRS MITRE Pre-ATK People Information Gathering: T1266 Acquire OSINT data sets and information
